summary: This bill, the Climate Change Resiliency Fund for America Act of 2025, establishes a Climate Change Advisory Commission to develop recommendations for projects addressing climate change impacts. It creates the Climate Change Resiliency Fund, financed by the issuance of climate change obligations by the Secretary of the Treasury. The fund will provide grants to eligible entities for projects focused on climate change adaptation, prioritizing those benefiting vulnerable communities. The bill outlines definitions, commission duties, funding mechanisms, and the promotion of the obligations.
